title: Kerning problem in word 2010 (mac)
content:
Hello,

I'm new on the forum so I introduce myself

i'm a swiss student, and I tried for my studies In ancient history to build a font.  
I used fontforge and finally fontlab. Everything works perfectly except the kerning.

MS word 2010 doesen't take count of the kerning of my new font...  
Kerning works perfectly on Oppen office, but I have to make it work on MS word. Is it possible ?

Somebody knows what is the problem ? Can somebody help me ?

Thanks for help :)  
1nordman
author: 1nordman

comments.content:
Hello,

My problem is solved,  
I found the solution reading the topic :  
Font with Kerning only works in TextEdit: [http://typophile.com/node/102341](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809221523/http:/typophile.com/node/102341)

Sorry, I should have read more before posting.  
Thanks a lot to Jafo's answer on 28 Apr 2013 — 1:11pm  
I tried the solution : PS + features and it realy works.
